name: Mac & Cheese
description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with crispy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Delicious pizza with grilled BBQ chicken, mozzarella, and red onions, topped with fresh cilantro.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, and croutons, tossed in a classic Caesar dressing.

name: Bacon Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, lettuce, tomato, and onion on a toasted bun.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomatoes on a crispy thin crust.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken, served over fettuccine pasta with a side of garlic bread.

name: Buffalo Wings
description: Spicy buffalo wings served with celery sticks and a side of ranch or blue cheese dressing.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Grilled fish tacos with cabbage slaw, fresh salsa, and a tangy lime crema.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Steak Frites
description: Grilled steak served with crispy French fries and a side of garlic herb butter.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet served with steamed vegetables and a side of lemon butter sauce.

name: Veggie Burger
description: A hearty plant-based burger patty with lettuce, tomato, avocado, and vegan mayo on a whole-grain bun.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, Parmesan cheese, pancetta, and pepper, served over al dente spaghetti.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Succulent shrimp saut√©ed in a garlic butter sauce with white wine, lemon, and parsley, served over linguine.

name: Chicken Tenders
description: Crispy golden-brown chicken tenders, served with fries and a side of honey mustard or barbecue sauce.
